Translations.Text: lillezine ahsenu-lhusna veziyadeh. vela yerheku vucuhehum kateruv vela zilleh. ulaike ashabu-lcenneh. hum fiha halidun
vellezine kesebu-sseyyiati cezau seyyietim bimisliha veterhekuhum zilleh. ma lehum mine-llahi min `asim. keennema ugsiyet vucuhuhum kita`am mine-lleyli muzlima. ulaike ashabu-nnar. hum fiha halidun
veyevme nahsuruhum cemi`an summe nekulu lillezine esraku mekanekum entum vesurakaukum. fezeyyelna beynehum vekale surakauhum ma kuntum iyyana ta`budun
fekefa billahi sehidem beynena vebeynekum in kunna `an `ibadetikum legafilin
hunalike teblu kullu nefsim ma eslefet veruddu ile-llahi mevlahumu-lhakki vedalle `anhum ma kanu yefterun

kul mey yerzukukum mine-ssemai vel'ardi emmey yemliku-ssem`a vel'ebsara vemey yuhricu-lhayye mine-lmeyyiti veyuhricu-lmeyyite mine-lhayyi vemey yudebbiru-l'emr. feseyekulune-llah. fekul efela tettekun
fezalikumu-llahu rabbukumu-lhakk. femaza ba`de-lhakki ille-ddalal. feenna tusrafun
kezalike hakkat kelimetu rabbike `ale-llezine feseku ennehum la yu'minun
